description.value: Once per day, you can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Impaling Spike] as a 7th-rank innate occult spell, except the spike is made of bone instead of cold iron. The bone from the spell has the effects of the ghost touch property rune and can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized]{Immobilize} incorporeal creatures as if they were corporeal.
